properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 28 at 2:28PM PST until January 29 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds increasing to 20 to 30
kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 12 to 15 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25
kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 12 to 14 feet at 14 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM and Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade
Head OR from 10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 1 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY
